short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An enhancer for Twitch that modifies the UI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that modifies the Twitch UI a little.
Features at the moment:
- Load all followed channels: Following tab shows all your followed channels without the "Show more button" 
- Remove Stories: Remove the Stories tab on top of the "Following" list
- Remove the "carousel": Remove the annoying featuring "carousel" that auto-plays a stream on the frontpage

More features to come
